transportAdvice: Jaipur has a limited metro line that connects a few key areas, but most tourist sites are best reached by auto-rickshaw or taxi, which are widely available throughout the city. Walking between major attractions is generally impractical due to distances and traffic, so hiring a local driver for the day is a common and convenient option.
